item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hour series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in Providence.

This week's location is: The Waterman Grille (next to that pink building at the end of Waterman St. and in Richmond Square)

Okay, so its snowing, and it might not stop until Monday afternoon. So in light of the snow and if you care to venture outside, there is parking (hopefully plowed) and it's a direct shot on streets that will probably be plowed. So you're a little egg-nogged out, you indulged a little too much over the Holidays...who cares! Come out and and have some fun. In the snow, no less!
This is a fave by many Collective members - moi included - so walk, drive, and get yourself to this cozy little oasis on the far east side! The Waterman Grille is at the end of Waterman Ave. in Richmond Square - all the way at the end of Waterman Ave. So at the end, you may have never seen it, but its a gem. If you've ever driven over the Henderson Bridge to East Providence, aka The Red Bridge, you've probably seen it on the right (at least you can' t miss the pink building). So let's check it out!

Hope to see you there!

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours.
Ever.
item.how_to_find_us: You'll find us, we're hard to miss! I'll be wearing a green coat and scarf!
item.name: Monday Night Meetup - Waterman Grille!
